mapper.select: SELECT pr.pass_review_id, pr.title, pr.created_date_time, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT pra.pass_review_access_id FROM pass_review_access pra WHERE pra.pass_review_id = pr.pass_review_id AND pra.member_id = #{reqMemberId} ) THEN true ELSE false END AS wasAccessed, COUNT( SELECT pass_review_note_id FROM pass_review_note prn WHERE prn.pass_review_id = pr.pass_review_id AND prn.note_type = 'DOCUMENT' ) AS documentNoteCount, COUNT( SELECT pass_review_note_id FROM pass_review_note prn WHERE prn.pass_review_id = pr.pass_review_id AND prn.note_type = 'DOCUMENT' ) AS interviewNoteCount FROM pass_review pr INNER JOIN club_member cm ON pr.club_member_id = cm.club_member_id AND cm.club_id = #{clubId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pass_review pr INNER JOIN club_member cm ON pr.club_member_id = cm.club_member_id AND cm.club_id = #{clubId}
